Emerging growth company&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&nbsp;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ITEM&nbsp;2.02 Results of Operations and Financial Condition. On February&nbsp;24, 2018, Berkshire Hathaway Inc. issued a press release announcing the Company&#146;s earnings for the fourth quarter and year ended December&nbsp;31, 2017. A copy of this press release is furnished with this report as an exhibit to this Form 8-K. &nbsp; ITEM&nbsp;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits Exhibit 99.1 Berkshire Hathaway Inc.
